issue.title: Orbit view controller movement swapped for X/Y hotkeys

content.raw:
actually looking at the [OrbiviewController code](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/8afec0e739b451a841f8b09dad6bb6c4c05c4d86/gazebo/rendering/OrbitViewController.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#OrbitViewController.cc-230) the logic is  simple:

* When `x` is pressed, camera is translated by the `y` displacement in screen space

* When `y` is pressed, camera is translated by the `x` displacement in screen space

* When `z` is pressed, camera is translated by the `y` displacement in screen space

There's a lot of room for improvement..

actually looking at the OrbiviewController code the logic is simple:

  • When x is pressed, camera is translated by the y displacement in screen space

  • When y is pressed, camera is translated by the x displacement in screen space

  • When z is pressed, camera is translated by the y displacement in screen space

There's a lot of room for improvement..
